file.name: swagger.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Cloud2Cloud Connector API
  description: "Provides API to maintenance linked clouds and linked accounts."
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html
  version: 1.0.0
tags:
  - name: Clouds
    description: Actions over linked clouds
  - name: Accounts
    description: Actions over linked accounts
  - name: Events
    description: Actions over coming events
paths:
  /api/v1/clouds:
    post:
      tags:
        - Clouds
      summary: Create linked cloud
      operationId: createCloud
      requestBody:
        description: Linked cloud object that needs to be added to the store
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: "#/components/schemas/LinkedCloud"
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/LinkedCloud"
      security:
        - c2c_connector_auth:
            - empty
    get:
      tags:
        - Clouds
      summary: List linked clouds
      operationId: listClouds
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful operation
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  cloudId:
                    $ref: "#/components/schemas/LinkedClouds"
      security:
        - c2c_connector_auth:
            - empty
  /api/v1/clouds/{cloudId}:
    delete:
      tags:
        - Clouds
      summary: Delete linked cloud
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/cloudId"
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful operation
      security:
        - c2c_connector_auth:
            - empty
  /api/v1/clouds/{cloudId}/accounts:
    get:
      tags:
        - Accounts
      summary: Create linked account
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/cloudId"
      responses:
        307:
          description: redirect to get authorization code
      security:
        - c2c_connector_auth:
            - empty
  /api/v1/clouds/{cloudId}/accounts/{accountId}:
    delete:
      tags:
        - Accounts
      summary: Delete linked account
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/cloudId"
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/accountId"
      responses:
        200:
          description: successful operation
      security:
        - c2c_connector_auth:
            - empty
  /api/v1/oauthCallback:
    get:
      tags:
        - Accounts
      summary: Used for get authorization code for linked account
      parameters:
        - $ref: "#/components/parameters/{oauthCallback}"
      responses:
        200:
          description: redirect to get authorization code
  /api/v1/events:
    $ref: "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openconnectivityfoundation/core-extensions/ocfcloud-openapi/swagger2.0/oic.r.cloudopenapi.swagger.json#/paths/%2F%7BeventsUrl%7D"
components:
  schemas:
    LinkedClouds:
      type: object
      properties:
        cloud:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/LinkedCloud"
    LinkedCloud:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          format: uuid
        name:
          type: string
        oauth:
          type: object
          properties:
            clientId:
              type: string
            clientSecret:
              type: string
            scopes:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
            authUrl:
              type: string
            tokenUrl:
              type: string
            authStyle:
              type: string
              enum: [autoDetect, inParams, inHeader]
            audience:
              type: string
            redirectUrl:
              type: string
            accessType:
              type: string
            responseType:
              type: string
            responseMode:
              type: string
        supportedSubscriptionEvents:
          type: object
          properties:
            devices:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
                enum:
                  [
                    devices_online,
                    devices_offline,
                    devices_registered,
                    devices_unregistered,
                  ]
            device:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
                enum: [resources_published, resources_unpublished]
            resource:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
                enum: [resource_contentchanged]
            staticDeviceEvents:
              type: boolean
        endpoint:
          type: object
          properties:
            url:
              type: string
            rootCas:
              type: array
              items:
                type: string
            insecureSkipVerify:
              type: boolean
            useSystemCas:
              type: boolean
  securitySchemes:
    c2c_connector_auth:
      type: oauth2
      flows:
        implicit:
          authorizationUrl: http://oauth/connect/token
          scopes:
            empty: value
  parameters:
    cloudId:
      name: cloudId
      in: path
      description: Id of the cloud
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        format: uuid
    accountId:
      name: accountId
      in: path
      description: Id of the account
      required: true
      schema:
        type: string
        format: uuid
    oauthCallback:
      name: oauthCallback
      schema:
        type: string
      in: path
      required: true

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: /api/v1/events: referenced pathItem not supported
